title: Fantasy World Loops 2
description: Great for your fantasy adventure, 2D, 3D mobile app games, motion graphics, film, and audio productions.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Fantasy World Loops 2 is an all original, royalty free ambience loop library designed to help you create stunning and immersive audio environments quickly. Great for your fantasy adventure, 2D, 3D mobile app games, motion graphics, film, and audio productions. With over 1.5 hours of popular location sound loops, you’ll be well equipped to create the perfect mood and sound environments that bring your fantasy world to life! 


All royalty-free and inspired by massive hit games in styles like fantasy MMORPG & Sci-fi. Fantasy World Loops 2 is an all original ambience loop library designed to help you create stunning and immersive audio environments quickly. Packed with over 1.5 hours of popular location sound loops, you’ll find everything you need for themed audio adventure productions. Invent new worlds in audio with immersive atmospheres and rich tones from this one of a kind set of seamlessly loop-able files that your audience will love. 


Includes: Dark Forge, Underwater, Alien Processors, Lair, Temple, City Ruins, Tunnel, Cave, Factory, Deep Space, Nightmare and many more. Great for podcasts, radio, and DJ sound effects too. Really, any audio production that needs background sound effects and scene setting ambient tones, Fantasy World Loops 2 has got you covered.


Fantasy World Loops 2 is the second installment of the Fantasy World ambience loop library series. All of the recordings are royalty free and delivered in .WAV 96kHz/24bit, giving you the best quality for heavy sound editing, pitch shifting, and fx processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision. Need more ambience loops? Be sure to check out the first release, Fantasy World Loops.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Air, Drone, Eerie, Ethereal, Industrial, Liquid, Mechanical, Nature, Sci-fi, Tonal and Underground. On top of UCS, Fantasy World Loops 2 features extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time as well.



Product details

138 game ambience loops

1.05 GB of samples

All in 44k 16bit .wav

1 hours 39 minutes of audio

Includes embedded Soundminer metadata

UCS Compliant

Save time, energy and get quality game audio assets!

Includes a variety of locations, tones and ambiences

Perfect for games, movies, ambiences, room tones, and film sound

Air - 10

Drone - 15

Eerie - 9

Ethereal - 5

Industrial - 9

Liquid - 4

Mech - 21

Nature - 3

Sci-fi - 29

Tonal - 24

Underground - 9

All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty free

RTU-OTB (Ready to be used out of the box)
